job.title: Senior Software Engineer - C / C++ / Python
job.description: We are a rapidly growing autonomy and robotics technology company that has been in business for over 20 years We are transforming government and commercial transportation with programs that include selfdriving cars and trucks autonomous shuttles UAV UAS and drones As we grow our team we are looking for passionate people who want to build longterm careers with usbrbrWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive Compensation Contingent On Experiencelili Health Vision and Dental Benefitslili 401k Matchinglili Parental Leavelili Life InsurancebrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Experience as a Senior Software Engineerlili C and  or Clili Pythonlili Ability to obtain government clearance although clearance is not required for this rolelili BS MS or PhD degree in the field of Robotics Computer Science or Electrical Mechanical or Aerospace Engineeringlili Sensor processing LIDAR image processing stereo cameras RADAR is a pluslili Familiarity with Linux or other POSIX operating systems Ubuntu and NuttX is a pluslili Experience with opensource drone development tools and flight controllers Pixhawk PX4 Ardupilot is a pluslili Experience with Robot Operating System ROS is a pluslili Familiarity with microcontroller programming or NVIDIA Jetson embedded platforms is a pluslili Kalman Filtering as applied to GPSINS or IMUs is a pluslili Localization Mapping SLAM is a plusbrliulWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Development of software algorithms related to guidance navigation and control of advanced multirotor aerial vehicleslili Software will support autonomous vehicle operations including navigation path planning obstacle avoidance sensor processing and perceptionlili Indoor and outdoor testing of software running on multirotor aerial vehicleslili Complete FAA Part 107 training and certificationlili Work as part of a multidisciplinary development team participating in team meetings design reviews brainstorming sessions and testing eventslili Document activities prepare tech reports present results and demonstrate system capabilitieslili Travel for field testing and project meetings may be requiredbrliulSo if you have the experience above please apply today or email me directly at edwinocampocybercoderscombrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website
